name: c-formatter-42
description: Format C files according to 42 School norminette using c_formatter_42

c-formatter-42.enableFormatOnSave.description: Enable formatting on save for C files

c-formatter-42.executablePath.description: Full path to the c_formatter_42 or c_formatter_42_wrapper executable

c-formatter-42.installOnStartup.description: Attempt to install the formatter if not found on startup

c-formatter-42.debug.description: Enable debug logging for the wrapper

c-formatter-42.enhancedMode.description: Use enhanced formatter mode for full norminette compliance (including 42 header, tabs/spaces, etc.)

c-formatter-42.environmentVariables.description: Environment variables to set when running the formatter

c-formatter-42.username.description: Your 42 username for the header (defaults to system username if empty)

c-formatter-42.email.description: Your 42 email for the header (defaults to username@student.42.fr if empty)

author: mvigara- (Marta)
